segments.text: Susan ! Why didn ’ t you tell me that you were taking over the Silk Company account ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I thought you knew , Todd . It was decided last week . I guess you weren ’ t at the meeting .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: You know I wasn ’ t at the meeting . I was meeting with Mr . Wei about this account . I ’ Ve been on this for a month and a half .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I ’ m sorry . Todd , but Mr . Emory felt that it was going too slowly , and that it needed a fresh start . He should have told you .
segments.speaker: S2
